title: Migration of Travel Planning Application from Angular 16 to Angular 21
subtitle: Frontend Development | Angular 16 & Angular 21
description: Addressing technical debt, manual migration of the Angular application from Angular 16 to Angular 21 including used dependencies. Driven by breaking changes in PrimeNG (introduction of a new styling system) and long-term transition from PrimeFlex to TailwindCSS.

title: AI-supported multi-platform Travel Planning Application
subtitle: Full-Stack Development | .NET Core & Angular 16
description: Responsible for the full-stack further development of a mobile application. Core focus was on the conception and implementation of innovative AI features for travel planning using OpenAI LLMs. In addition, scalability was significantly improved through complete containerization of the three-layer architecture and the resolution of technical debt.

title: E2E Test Automation & Test Infrastructure
subtitle: QA Engineering | Playwright & TypeScript
description: Development and establishment of an international E2E test infrastructure in a SCRUM environment. This included the strategic planning of test cases, the technical implementation of automated tests with Playwright, and integration into CI/CD pipelines to ensure the highest software quality.

title: Modernization & Support of Warehouse Control System
subtitle: Database Development | VBA & SQL Server
description: Long-term support and optimization of a critical warehouse control solution. Focus on stabilizing the system through targeted error analysis, bug fixes, and performance optimizations at the SQL Server interface.

title: Further Development of PLM System (Aras Innovator)
subtitle: Backend & Integration | C# & AML
description: Collaboration in an agile team to expand a PLM platform in the industrial sector. Implementation of complex business logic in the backend as well as data structure adjustments using AML (Aras Markup Language) and C#.

title: Reporting Solutions for ALM Systems
subtitle: PoC & Tooling | Java & Docker
description: Successful execution of a Proof of Concept to extend Intland Codebeamer ALM. Development of individual Java-based reporting widgets within a containerized development environment.

title: Interactive KPI Dashboard & Logic Editor
subtitle: Frontend Architecture | Angular & TypeScript
description: Conception and realization of a high-performance web frontend for visualizing key figures. Highlight was the development of a graphical drag-and-drop builder for intuitive modeling of complex logic workflows.

title: Scalable REST API & Data Transformation
subtitle: Backend Architecture | .NET Core & ASP.NET WebAPI
description: Design and implementation of a central interface architecture for processing complex data imports. Including migration of the existing application to .NET Core 3.1 as well as implementation of a role-based access concept.

title: ETL Database Modeling & Performance
subtitle: Database Engineering | MS SQL Server
description: Design and implementation of a highly flexible, historized database architecture. Optimization of ETL processes for efficient processing of non-specific data volumes including maintenance and migration strategies.

title: Automation via Windows Services
subtitle: Backend Automation | C# & Multithreading
description: Development of a robust Windows service for automating parallel data imports. Increasing throughput by using the Task Parallel Library (TPL) and intelligent load balancing.

title: Enterprise Excel Add-ins for Data Transfer
subtitle: Office Integration | C# & VSTO
description: Development of professional Excel VSTO add-ins for process optimization. Automated extraction and validation of technical data into XML structures for seamless integration into downstream systems.

title: Security-critical License Management
subtitle: Application Security | C# & RSA
description: Development of a desktop application for managing RSA-encrypted software licenses. Focus on data security and user guidance within the licensing processes.

title: Prototyping for Data Management Systems
subtitle: Web Development | ASP.NET MVC
description: Creation of a feasibility study and implementation of a web-based prototype for dynamic data management. Use of modern web technologies to demonstrate flexible data structures.

title: Digitization of PLM Workflows
subtitle: Process Optimization | C# & VSTO
description: Analysis and digital transformation of manual workflows in the engineering environment. Development of automation solutions for migrating historized data sets into PLM systems.

title: Web-based Time Tracking & HR Workflows
subtitle: Web Application | ASP.NET WebForms
description: Long-term modernization of an enterprise application for time management. Implementation of complex approval workflows (vacation requests) and creation of automated reports using SSRS.

title: ETL Infrastructure & DWH Management
subtitle: Business Intelligence | SSIS & SSRS
description: Support and further development of data integration processes in the EDM/PDM environment. Responsible for transforming data into a central SQL Server Data Warehouse and providing BI reports.
